document.full_text: a texas county sheriff's office said on tuesday there was no evidence yet that bodies had been found at a rural home after initially saying up to 30 corpses were discovered, a kprc-tv report said.
document.title: sheriff says no evidence of texas mass grave: local media
lines_and_colors: a texas county sheriff's office said on tuesday there was no evidence yet that bodies had been found at a rural home after initially saying up to 30 corpses were discovered, a kprc-tv report said.
